title.narrative: INCLUSIVE QUALITY EDUCATION & EARLY LEARNING

description.narrative: PRIORITY: LEARNING: for every child, Inclusive Quality Education and Early Learning, which contributes to Access To Quality Learning Opportunities. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: New Element

sector.narrative: Provision of (formal and non-formal) multiple-levels or alternative pathways of education (including in temporary learning spaces)
System strengthening - inclusive education for other vulnerable children poorest quintile, ethnic/linguistic minorities, migrant children, non-citizens/undocumented children etc.
Technical assistance - Equitable access to quality education

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: PRIORITY: LEARNING: for every child, Inclusive Quality Education and Early Learning

description.narrative: In 2021 UNICEF, in partnership with;the Ministry of Education and Religious Affairs (MoERA),;the Ministry of Migration;and;Asylum (MoMA),;the Ministry of Labour and Social Affairs (MLSA),;;various NGOs and the Academia,;contributed to:Strengthening;inclusive quality education through the development of strategic documents;(including a new 3-year refugee education plan endorsed by GoG);Delivering;Non Formal Education to refugee and migrant children across Greece including the islands, all refugee camps in Greece and in urban areas;Coordinating and chairing;the Education Sector Working Group;Expanding the CO educational agenda in new areas, including Early Childhood Education;(following the development of the first CO CPD). | Status:Met | As-of Date:19/01/2022
